verses.verse: My son,<WH1121> if<WH518> you will receive<WH3947> my words,<WH561> and hide<WH6845> my commandments<WH4687> with you;
So that you incline<WH7181> your ear<WH241> to wisdom,<WH2451> and apply<WH5186> your heart<WH3820> to understanding;<WH8394>
Yes,<WH3588> if<WH518> you cry<WH7121> after knowledge,<WH998> and lift<WH5414> up your voice<WH6963> for understanding;<WH8394>
If<WH518> you seek<WH1245> her as silver,<WH3701> and search<WH2664> for her as for hid<WH4301> treasures;<WH4301>
Then<WH227> shall you understand<WH995> the fear<WH3374> of the LORD,<WH3068> and find<WH4672> the knowledge<WH1847> of God.<WH430>
For the LORD<WH3068> gives<WH5414> wisdom:<WH2451> out of his mouth<WH6310> comes knowledge<WH1847> and understanding.<WH8394>
He lays<WH6845> up sound<WH8454> wisdom<WH8454> for the righteous:<WH3477> he is a buckler<WH4043> to them that walk<WH1980> uprightly.<WH8537>
He keeps<WH5341> the paths<WH734> of judgment,<WH4941> and preserves<WH8104> the way<WH1870> of his saints.<WH2623>
Then<WH227> shall you understand<WH995> righteousness,<WH6664> and judgment,<WH4941> and equity;<WH4339> yes, every<WH3605> good<WH2896> path.<WH4570>
When<WH3588> wisdom<WH2451> enters<WH935> into your heart,<WH3820> and knowledge<WH1847> is pleasant<WH5276> to your soul;<WH5315>
Discretion<WH4209> shall preserve<WH8104> you, understanding<WH8394> shall keep<WH5341> you:
To deliver<WH5337> you from the way<WH1870> of the evil<WH7451> man,<WH376> from the man that speaks<WH1696> fraudulent<WH8419> things;
Who leave<WH5800> the paths<WH734> of uprightness,<WH3476> to walk<WH3212> in the ways<WH1870> of darkness;<WH2822>
Who rejoice<WH8056> to do<WH6213> evil,<WH7451> and delight<WH1523> in the frowardness<WH8419> of the wicked;<WH7451>
Whose<WH834> ways<WH734> are crooked,<WH6141> and they fraudulent<WH3868> in their paths:<WH4570>
To deliver<WH5337> you from the strange<WH2114> woman,<WH802> even from the stranger<WH5237> which flatters<WH2505> with her words;<WH561>
Which forsakes<WH5800> the guide<WH441> of her youth,<WH5271> and forgets<WH7913> the covenant<WH1285> of her God.<WH430>
For her house<WH1004> inclines<WH7743> to death,<WH4194> and her paths<WH4570> to the dead.<WH7496>
None<WH3808> that go<WH935> to her return<WH7725> again,<WH7725> neither take<WH5381> they hold<WH5381> of the paths<WH734> of life.<WH2416>
That you may walk<WH3212> in the way<WH1870> of good<WH2896> men, and keep<WH8104> the paths<WH734> of the righteous.<WH6662>
For the upright<WH3477> shall dwell<WH7931> in the land,<WH776> and the perfect<WH8549> shall remain<WH3498> in it.
But the wicked<WH7563> shall be cut<WH3772> off from the earth,<WH776> and the transgressors<WH898> shall be rooted<WH5255> out of it.
